TPC

Initially, the TpC bot was meant to be integrated with ChatGPT, allowing users to receive AI-driven responses to their queries. However, this idea was later abandoned, shifting the focus toward developing features more tailored to Discord users’ needs. This change allowed TpC to evolve into a versatile tool, capable of automating various tasks, supporting gaming and social interactions, and helping communities engage more effectively.

Optimization

The bot operates 24/7, ensuring continuous active functionality, including role assignment and moderation tools, without any interruptions.

Universal

The bot offers a wide range of features, including moderation tools, role assignment, and convenient stylized message formatting.

Security

Our bot is completely secure, utilizing the best protection methods to ensure safety. Additionally, spam through our bot is not possible. TOS
